body: Guess this inspired the weirdo in my DM a few days ago lol
@DingusFungus that's because the author's current style is growing more and more realistic
I'm willing to bet that at least some of this is based on actual photos from various conventions
yea, nice to discuss with ya.
Yeah fair point, even I would lose a boner if not given enough context and this got shown to me out of the blue. Well i tip my hat off to you good sir.
yea, ok good point but, if i want to look at attractive cosplayers i look that up. i dont want to look at a weird human anime hybrid on nhentai.

Well that is true, but i think the person who drawn this kinda hit spot on the mark for cosplayers who cosplay as anime characters. Like its hard to fully capture a 2D character and ask someone to cosplay it as 1-to-1 anime character. There will alwasy be an uncanny valley for cosplayers to overcome. As for now this shit is one of if not the closet thing that you can imagine to be considered realistic.
That has to be some of the most terrifying Uncanny valley level shit ever posted here what the absolute fuck
